title: TruQoin
author: TruQoin
content: If it is not broke, then don't fix it!  The success of Bitcoin deserves emulation!TrūQoin uses a different form of work than Bitcoin's Proof-of-Work model.  TrūQoin uses the work of all the people, whose activities in the physical business TrūIQ® Global, as the "Proof" that "Work" was used in the mining and this "Proves" that "Value" is created. The work/activity is recorded to a blockchain as a transaction.  In this Proof-of-Activity-Mining model is rewarded as Mining Power. The more Mining Power a Miner gains and the larger amount of TrūQoin rewards the miner for their activity.Description https://www.truqoin.infoMining (Web3 login)https://www.truqoin.ioProduct Sales Companyhttps://www.truiqglobal.comHalving Event Tablehttps://static.wixstatic.com/media/e16860_a25819df0fbb472987962c70f311047b~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_1231,h_812,fp_0.50_0.50,q_90,enc_auto/e16860_a25819df0fbb472987962c70f311047b~mv2.png

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: This is to inform everyone that there is a scam accusation about this project:[WARNING] Truqoin - Fake TeamAll team members appear to be fake. This is a big red flag that everyone should be aware of if they plan to invest in this project.

comments.author: MK5423
comments.body: #PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: MK5423Forum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3521141Telegram Username: @RekhaAkter10 Participated Campaigns: Twitter,Telegram,FacebookBEP-20 Wallet Address: 0x8d0cDC1DF8E6be0ee77712d5BC537A0Ff390a8E8
